items.title: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max Prices Slashed Further In New Deals
items.description: Amazon’s Big Spring Deal is in full swing and it includes some further, deeper discounts on refurbished iPhone 15 Pro and Pro Max handsets.

items.title: Microsoft’s Copilot Agents  Transform Executive Decision-Making
items.description: Microsoft Copilot’s Researcher and Analyst agents represent a significant leap toward AI-augmented leadership.

items.title: ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ Season 2 Spoilers Fly With New Set Leaks
items.description: Daredevil Born Again season 2 is filming, and there is no avoiding spoilers at this point given its central location.

items.title: How A Fitness Tracker Can Help People With Diabetes
items.description: A newly published study looks into the impact of a fitness tracker watch on the early treatment of those recently diagnosed with diabetes.
